text.para: Comments can be used to explain code, and to make it more readable. It can also be used to prevent execution when testing alternative code.Comments can be singled-lined or multi-lined.

list.item: Single-line comments start with two forward slashes (//).
Any text between // and the end of the line is ignored by the compiler (will not be executed).
Multi-line comments start with /* and ends with */.
Any text between /* and */ will be ignored by the compiler
Tip: Two \n characters after each other will create a blank line
